title: What i do?
frontend: I develop websites according to your ToR, I will copy any website, finalize an already completed project, and I can also help with installing the site on hosting.
design: I develop a quality stylish design in accordance with current trends or your wishes for your website, mobile application. I will fulfill all your wishes and hand over the work at the designated time.
backend: I develop a back-end for your project. I can implement any functionality at your request, be it notifications in Telegram, etc. And I can also implement a full-stack project for you, a project at your request.
